# Wizard's Research
## Overview
**Wizard’s Research:** This well-appointed area has everything a wizard would want for arcane experiments and spell research.

*Components:* [[Alchemical Laboratory, Fancy|Fancy alchemical laboratory]], [[Library, Fancy|fancy library]] (includes books on arcana, general knowledge, and the planes), [[Magic Laboratory, Fancy|fancy magic laboratory]], [[Study_Office, Fancy|fancy office]], [[Servants' Quarters|servants’ quarters]]; *Size:* 5 stronghold spaces; *Cost:* 16,900 gp.

*Staff:* Alchemist, apprentice spellcaster; *Upkeep:* 60 gp per month.
